title: The exemplary lives and memorable acts of nine the most worthy women in the vvorld three Iewes. Three gentiles. Three Christians. Written by the author of the History of women.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Richard Royston, and are to be sold at the signe of the Angell in Ivie Lane,
notes: Dedication signed: Tho. Heyvv., i.e. Thomas Heywood.
The words "Three Iewes. .. Three Christians." are bracketed together on the title page.
The plates are engraved by George Glover; nine of them (excepting that of Queen Henrietta Maria) were issued separately with verses as "The nine woemen worthys" (STC 11921.6).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
